   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(beam_bounds_SUITE).
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   24:          addition_bounds/1, subtraction_bounds/1,
   25:          multiplication_bounds/1, division_bounds/1, rem_bounds/1,
   26:          band_bounds/1, bor_bounds/1, bxor_bounds/1,
   27:          bsr_bounds/1, bsl_bounds/1,
   28:          bnot_bounds/1,
   29:          lt_bounds/1, le_bounds/1, gt_bounds/1, ge_bounds/1,
   30:          min_bounds/1, max_bounds/1,
   31:          abs_bounds/1,
   32:          infer_lt_gt_bounds/1,
   33:          redundant_masking/1]).
   34: 
   35: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   36: 
   37: all() ->
   38:     [{group,p}].
   39: 
   40: groups() ->
   41:     [{p,[parallel],
   42:       [addition_bounds,
   43:        subtraction_bounds,
   44:        multiplication_bounds,
   45:        division_bounds,
   46:        rem_bounds,
   47:        band_bounds,
   48:        bor_bounds,
   49:        bxor_bounds,
   50:        bnot_bounds,
   51:        bsr_bounds,
   52:        bsl_bounds,
   53:        lt_bounds,
   54:        le_bounds,
   55:        gt_bounds,
   56:        ge_bounds,
   57:        min_bounds,
   58:        max_bounds,
   59:        abs_bounds,
   60:        infer_lt_gt_bounds,
   61:        redundant_masking]}].
   62: 
   63: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   64:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   65:     Config.
   66: 
   67: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   68:     ok.
   69: 
   70: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   71:     Config.
   72: 
   73: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   74:     Config.
   75: 
   76: addition_bounds(_Config) ->
   77:     test_commutative('+', {-12,12}),
   78: 
   79:     {'-inf',-15} = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {'-inf',-20}, {2,5}),
   80:     {'-inf',55} = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {'-inf',50}, {'-inf',5}),
   81:     {'-inf',110} = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {1,10}, {'-inf',100}),
   82:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {1,'+inf'}, {'-inf',100}),
   83: 
   84:     {-8,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {2,'+inf'}, {-10,20}),
   85:     {6,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {1,10}, {5,'+inf'}),
   86:     {9,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {2,'+inf'}, {7,'+inf'}),
   87: 
   88:     ok.
   89: 
   90: subtraction_bounds(_Config) ->
   91:     test_noncommutative('-', {-12,12}),
   92: 
   93:     {'-inf',18} = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {'-inf',20}, {2,9}),
   94:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {'-inf',20}, {'-inf',17}),
   95:     {-99,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {1,10}, {'-inf',100}),
   96:     {-93,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {7,'+inf'}, {'-inf',100}),
   97: 
   98:     {-18,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {2,'+inf'}, {-10,20}),
   99:     {'-inf',6} = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {1,11}, {5,'+inf'}),
  100:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {2,'+inf'}, {7,'+inf'}),
  101: 
  102:     ok.
  103: 
  104: multiplication_bounds(_Config) ->
  105:     test_commutative('*', {-12,12}),
  106: 
  107:     {'-inf',-40} = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {'-inf',-20}, {2,5}),
  108:     {'-inf',1000} = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {'-inf',100}, {1,10}),
  109:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {'-inf',100}, {-10,10}),
  110: 
  111:     {-100,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {-10,'+inf'}, {1,10}),
  112:     {7,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {7,'+inf'}, {1,10}),
  113:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {-10,'+inf'}, {-5,5}),
  114: 
  115:     {'-inf',1000} = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {1,10}, {'-inf',100}),
  116:     {-100,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {1,10}, {-10,'+inf'}),
  117: 
  118:     ok.
  119: 
  120: division_bounds(_Config) ->
  121:     test_noncommutative('div', {-12,12}),
  122: 
  123:     {'-inf',-5} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {'-inf',-20}, {2,4}),
  124:     {'-inf',50} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {'-inf',100}, {2,4}),
  125: 
  126:     {-5,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {-10,'+inf'}, {2,4}),
  127:     {2,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {10,'+inf'}, {2,4}),
  128: 
  129:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {10,'+inf'}, {0,0}),
  130:     {'EXIT', {badarith, _}} = catch division_bounds_1([], ok),
  131: 
  132:     {-10,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {0,10}, any),
  133:     {-50,50} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {-50,-15}, {-10,'+inf'}),
  134:     {-20,20} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {-20,10}, any),
  135:     {-7,7} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {-5,7}, {'-inf',-1}),
  136:     {-42,42} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {42,42}, any),
  137:     {-42,42} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {-42,-42}, any),
  138: 
  139:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {'-inf',10}, any),
  140:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {0,'+inf'}, any),
  141: 
  142:     ok.
  143: 
  144: %% GH-6604: Division by zero could cause type analysis to hang forever as
  145: %% beam_bounds would return a bogus result.
  146: division_bounds_1([], X) ->
  147:     -1 div division_bounds_1(X, ok);
  148: division_bounds_1(_, _) ->
  149:     0.
  150: 
  151: rem_bounds(_Config) ->
  152:     test_noncommutative('rem', {-12,12}),
  153: 
  154:     {-7,7} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', any, {1,8}),
  155:     {-11,11} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', any, {-12,8}),
  156: 
  157:     {-7,7} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {'-inf',10}, {1,8}),
  158:     {0,7} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {10,'+inf'}, {1,8}),
  159:     {0,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {17,'+inf'}, any),
  160: 
  161:     {0,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {1,10}, {'-inf',10}),
  162:     {0,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {20,'+inf'}, {10,'+inf'}),
  163:     {'-inf',10} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {'-inf',10}, any),
  164: 
  165:     {-11,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {-11,10}, {'-inf',89}),
  166:     {-11,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {-11,10}, {7,'+inf'}),
  167:     {-11,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {-11,10}, {'-inf',113}),
  168:     {-11,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {-11,10}, {55,'+inf'}),
  169:     {-11,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {-11,10}, any),
  170: 
  171:     {0,0} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {0,0}, any),
  172:     {0,1} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {1,1}, any),
  173:     {0,2} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {2,2}, any),
  174:     {0,3} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {2,3}, any),
  175: 
  176:     {-1,0} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {-1,-1}, any),
  177:     {-7,0} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {-7,-7}, any),
  178:     {-6,0} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {-6,-4}, any),
  179: 
  180:     ok.
  181: 
  182: band_bounds(_Config) ->
  183:     test_commutative('band'),
  184: 
  185:     %% Coverage.
  186:     {0,17} = beam_bounds:bounds('band', any, {7,17}),
  187:     {0,42} = beam_bounds:bounds('band', {0,42}, any),
  188:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('band', {-1,1}, any),
  189:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('band', any, {-10,0}),
  190:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('band', {-10,0}, {-1,10}),
  191:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('band', {-20,-10}, {-1,10}),
  192: 
  193:     ok.
  194: 
  195: bor_bounds(_Config) ->
  196:     test_commutative('bor'),
  197: 
  198:     {'-inf',15} = beam_bounds:bounds('bor', {-10,7},{3,10}),
  199:     {'-inf',11} = beam_bounds:bounds('bor', {-10,1},{-1,10}),
  200:     {'-inf',-1} = beam_bounds:bounds('bor', {-20,-10}, {-2,10}),
  201: 
  202:     {'-inf',15} = beam_bounds:bounds('bor', {'-inf',10}, {3,5}),
  203:     {'-inf',-1} = beam_bounds:bounds('bor', {-20,-10}, {-100,-50}),
  204: 
  205:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bor', {-20,-10}, {-2,'+inf'}),
  206:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bor', {-20,'+inf'}, {-7,-3}),
  207: 
  208:     {16,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bor', {0,8}, {16,'+inf'}),
  209:     {16,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bor', {3,'+inf'}, {16,'+inf'}),
  210: 
  211:     ok.
  212: 
  213: bxor_bounds(_Config) ->
  214:     test_commutative('bxor'),
  215: 
  216:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bxor', {-10,0}, {-1,10}),
  217:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bxor', {-20,-10}, {-1,10}),
  218: 
  219:     ok.
  220: 
  221: bnot_bounds(_Config) ->
  222:     Min = -7,
  223:     Max = 7,
  224:     Seq = lists:seq(Min, Max),
  225:     _ = [bnot_bounds_1({A,B}) ||
  226:             A <- Seq,
  227:             B <- lists:nthtail(A-Min, Seq)],
  228: 
  229:     {-43,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bnot', {'-inf',42}),
  230:     {99,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bnot', {'-inf',-100}),
  231:     {'-inf',-8} = beam_bounds:bounds('bnot', {7,'+inf'}),
  232:     {'-inf',9} = beam_bounds:bounds('bnot', {-10,'+inf'}),
  233:     {-1114111,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bnot', {'-inf', 1114110}),
  234: 
  235:     -1 = bnot_bounds_2(0),
  236:     -43 = bnot_bounds_2_coverage(id(42)),
  237:     {'EXIT',{badarith,_}} = catch bnot_bounds_2_coverage(id(bad)),
  238: 
  239:     {'EXIT',{_,_}} = catch bnot_bounds_3(id(true)),
  240:     {'EXIT',{_,_}} = catch bnot_bounds_3(id(false)),
  241:     {'EXIT',{_,_}} = catch bnot_bounds_3(id(0)),
  242: 
  243:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,-3},_}} = catch bnot_bounds_4(),
  244: 
  245:     ok.
  246: 
  247: bnot_bounds_1(R) ->
  248:     {HighestMin,LowestMax} = min_max_unary_op('bnot', R),
  249:     {Min,Max} = beam_bounds:bounds('bnot', R),
  250:     if
  251:         Min =< HighestMin, LowestMax =< Max ->
  252:             ok;
  253:         true ->
  254:             io:format("bnot(~p) evaluates to ~p; should be ~p\n",
  255:                       [R,{Min,Max},{HighestMin,LowestMax}]),
  256:             ct:fail(bad_min_or_max)
  257:         end.
  258: 
  259: %% GH-7145: 'bnot' converged too slowly, effectively hanging the compiler.
  260: bnot_bounds_2(0) -> -1;
  261: bnot_bounds_2(N) -> abs(bnot bnot_bounds_2(N)).
  262: 
  263: bnot_bounds_2_coverage(N) -> bnot N.
  264: 
  265: %% GH-7468. Would result in a bad_typed_register failure in beam_validator.
  266: bnot_bounds_3(A) ->
  267:     (bnot round(((A xor false) andalso 1) + 2)) bsr ok.
  268: 
  269: %% GH-7468. Would result in a bad_arg_type failure in beam_validator.
  270: bnot_bounds_4() ->
  271:     << 0 || A <- [1,2], _ <- bnot round(A + trunc(A))>>.
  272: 
  273: 
  274: bsr_bounds(_Config) ->
  275:     test_noncommutative('bsr', {-12,12}, {0,7}),
  276: 
  277:     {0,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {0,10}, {0,'+inf'}),
  278:     {0,2} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {0,10}, {2,'+inf'}),
  279: 
  280:     {-1,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {-1,10}, {0,'+inf'}),
  281:     {-100,900} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {-100,900}, {0,'+inf'}),
  282:     {-50,450} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {-100,900}, {1,'+inf'}),
  283: 
  284:     {'-inf',16} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {'-inf',32}, {1,10}),
  285:     {-5,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {-10,'+inf'}, {1,10}),
  286: 
  287:     ok.
  288: 
  289: bsl_bounds(_Config) ->
  290:     test_noncommutative('bsl', {-12,12}, {-7,7}),
  291: 
  292:     {2,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {1,10}, {1,10_000}),
  293:     {0,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {1,10}, {-10,10_000}),
  294:     {'-inf',-20} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-30,-10}, {1,10_000}),
  295:     {'-inf',-2} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-9,-1}, {1,10_000}),
  296:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-7,10}, {1,10_000}),
  297: 
  298:     {0,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {0,'+inf'}, {0,'+inf'}),
  299:     {20,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {20,30}, {0,'+inf'}),
  300: 
  301:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-10,100}, {0,'+inf'}),
  302:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-10,100}, {1,'+inf'}),
  303:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-10,100}, {-1,'+inf'}),
  304: 
  305:     {0,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {1,10}, {'-inf',0}),
  306:     {0,20} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {1,10}, {'-inf',1}),
  307:     {-7,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-7,10}, {'-inf',0}),
  308:     {-28,40} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-7,10}, {'-inf',2}),
  309: 
  310:     {'-inf',-1} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-10,-1}, {500,1024}),
  311:     {0,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {1,10}, {500,1024}),
  312: 
  313:     {'-inf',-40} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {'-inf',-10}, {2,64}),
  314:     {'-inf',224} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {'-inf',7}, {3,5}),
  315: 
  316:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {'-inf',7}, {3,'+inf'}),
  317: 
  318:     ok.
  319: 
  320: lt_bounds(_Config) ->
  321:     test_relop('<').
  322: 
  323: le_bounds(_Config) ->
  324:     test_relop('=<').
  325: 
  326: gt_bounds(_Config) ->
  327:     test_relop('>').
  328: 
  329: ge_bounds(_Config) ->
  330:     test_relop('>=').
  331: 
  332: min_bounds(_Config) ->
  333:     test_commutative(min, {-12,12}),
  334: 
  335:     {'-inf',-10} = min_bounds({'-inf',-10}, {1,100}),
  336:     {'-inf',1} = min_bounds({'-inf',1}, {1,100}),
  337:     {'-inf',50} = min_bounds({'-inf',50}, {1,100}),
  338:     {'-inf',100} = min_bounds({'-inf',500}, {1,100}),
  339: 
  340:     {'-inf',-10} = min_bounds({'-inf',-10}, {1,'+inf'}),
  341:     {'-inf',1} = min_bounds({'-inf',1}, {1,'+inf'}),
  342:     {'-inf',700} = min_bounds({'-inf',700}, {1,'+inf'}),
  343: 
  344:     {1,99} = min_bounds({1,99}, {100,'+inf'}),
  345:     {1,100} = min_bounds({1,100}, {100,'+inf'}),
  346:     {100,200} = min_bounds({150,200}, {100,'+inf'}),
  347: 
  348:     {'-inf',10} = min_bounds({1,10}, any),
  349:     any = min_bounds({1,'+inf'}, any),
  350:     {'-inf',777} = min_bounds(any, {'-inf',777}),
  351: 
  352:     ok.
  353: 
  354: min_bounds(R1, R2) ->
  355:     Result = beam_bounds:bounds(min, R1, R2),
  356:     Result = beam_bounds:bounds(min, R2, R1).
  357: 
  358: max_bounds(_Config) ->
  359:     test_commutative(max, {-12,12}),
  360: 
  361:     {1,100} = max_bounds({'-inf',-10}, {1,100}),
  362:     {1,100} = max_bounds({'-inf',1}, {1,100}),
  363:     {1,100} = max_bounds({'-inf',50}, {1,100}),
  364:     {1,500} = max_bounds({'-inf',500}, {1,100}),
  365: 
  366:     {1,'+inf'}  = max_bounds({'-inf',-10}, {1,'+inf'}),
  367:     {1,'+inf'} = max_bounds({'-inf',1}, {1,'+inf'}),
  368:     {1,'+inf'} = max_bounds({'-inf',700}, {1,'+inf'}),
  369: 
  370:     {100,'+inf'} = max_bounds({1,99}, {100,'+inf'}),
  371:     {100,'+inf'} = max_bounds({1,100}, {100,'+inf'}),
  372:     {150,'+inf'} = max_bounds({150,200}, {100,'+inf'}),
  373: 
  374:     {1,'+inf'} = max_bounds({1,99}, any),
  375:     {10,'+inf'} = max_bounds({10,'+inf'}, any),
  376:     any = max_bounds({'-inf',70}, any),
  377: 
  378:     ok.
  379: 
  380: max_bounds(R1, R2) ->
  381:     Result = beam_bounds:bounds(max, R1, R2),
  382:     Result = beam_bounds:bounds(max, R2, R1).
  383: 
  384: abs_bounds(_Config) ->
  385:     Min = -7,
  386:     Max = 7,
  387:     Seq = lists:seq(Min, Max),
  388:     _ = [abs_bounds_1({A,B}) ||
  389:             A <- Seq,
  390:             B <- lists:nthtail(A-Min, Seq)],
  391:     ok.
  392: 
  393: abs_bounds_1(R) ->
  394:     {HighestMin,LowestMax} = min_max_unary_op('abs', R),
  395:     {Min,Max} = beam_bounds:bounds(abs, R),
  396:     if
  397:         Min =< HighestMin, LowestMax =< Max ->
  398:             ok;
  399:         true ->
  400:             io:format("~p(~p) evaluates to ~p; should be ~p\n",
  401:                       [bif_abs,R,{Min,Max},{HighestMin,LowestMax}]),
  402:             ct:fail(bad_min_or_max)
  403:         end.
  404: 
  405: infer_lt_gt_bounds(_Config) ->
  406:     {{'-inf',-1}, {'-inf',0}} = infer_lt_gt({'-inf',0}, {'-inf',0}),
  407:     {{'-inf',1}, {'-inf',2}} = infer_lt_gt({'-inf',1}, {'-inf',2}),
  408:     {{'-inf',-2}, {'-inf',-1}} = infer_lt_gt({'-inf',1}, {'-inf',-1}),
  409:     {{'-inf',2}, {1,3}} = infer_lt_gt({'-inf',2}, {1,3}),
  410: 
  411:     any = infer_lt_gt({'-inf',2}, {3,10}),
  412:     any = infer_lt_gt({'-inf',2}, {3,'+inf'}),
  413: 
  414:     {{0,10}, {1,84}}  = infer_lt_gt({0,10}, {'-inf',84}),
  415:     {{0,83}, {1,84}}  = infer_lt_gt({0,'+inf'}, {'-inf',84}),
  416: 
  417:     {{0,'+inf'}, {42, '+inf'}}  = infer_lt_gt({0,'+inf'}, {42, '+inf'}),
  418:     {{100,'+inf'}, {101, '+inf'}}  = infer_lt_gt({100,'+inf'}, {42, '+inf'}),
  419: 
  420:     ok.
  421: 
  422: %%% Utilities
  423: 
  424: infer_lt_gt(R1, R2) ->
  425:     case beam_bounds:infer_relop_types('>', R2, R1) of
  426:         {Rb,Ra} ->
  427:             {Ra,Rb} = beam_bounds:infer_relop_types('<', R1, R2);
  428:         any ->
  429:             any = beam_bounds:infer_relop_types('<', R1, R2)
  430:     end.
  431: 
  432: test_commutative(Op) ->
  433:     test_commutative(Op, {0,32}).
  434: 
  435: test_commutative(Op, {Min,Max}) ->
  436:     Seq = lists:seq(Min, Max),
  437:     _ = [test_commutative_1(Op, {A,B}, {C,D}) ||
  438:             A <- Seq,
  439:             B <- lists:nthtail(A-Min, Seq),
  440:             C <- lists:nthtail(A-Min, Seq),
  441:             D <- lists:nthtail(C-Min, Seq),
  442:             {A,B} =< {C,D}],
  443:     ok.
  444: 
  445: test_commutative_1(Op, R1, R2) ->
  446:     {HighestMin,LowestMax} = min_max_op(Op, R1, R2),
  447:     {Min,Max} = beam_bounds:bounds(Op, R1, R2),
  448:     {Min,Max} = beam_bounds:bounds(Op, R2, R1),
  449:     if
  450:         Min =< HighestMin, LowestMax =< Max ->
  451:             ok;
  452:         true ->
  453:             io:format("~p(~p, ~p) evaluates to ~p; should be ~p\n",
  454:                       [Op,R1,R2,{Min,Max},{HighestMin,LowestMax}]),
  455:             ct:fail(bad_min_or_max)
  456:         end.
  457: 
  458: test_noncommutative(Op, Range) ->
  459:     test_noncommutative(Op, Range, Range).
  460: 
  461: test_noncommutative(Op, {Min1,Max1}, {Min2,Max2}) ->
  462:     Seq1 = lists:seq(Min1, Max1),
  463:     Seq2 = lists:seq(Min2, Max2),
  464:     _ = [test_noncommutative_1(Op, {A,B}, {C,D}) ||
  465:             A <- Seq1,
  466:             B <- lists:nthtail(A-Min1, Seq1),
  467:             C <- Seq2,
  468:             D <- lists:nthtail(C-Min2, Seq2)],
  469:     ok.
  470: 
  471: test_noncommutative_1(Op, R1, R2) ->
  472:     {HighestMin,LowestMax} = min_max_op(Op, R1, R2),
  473:     case beam_bounds:bounds(Op, R1, R2) of
  474:         any ->
  475:             case {Op,R2} of
  476:                 {'div',{0,0}} -> ok;
  477:                 {'rem',{0,0}} -> ok
  478:             end;
  479:         {Min,Max} when Min =< HighestMin, LowestMax =< Max ->
  480:             ok;
  481:         {Min,Max} ->
  482:             io:format("~p(~p, ~p) evaluates to ~p; should be ~p\n",
  483:                       [Op,R1,R2,{Min,Max},{HighestMin,LowestMax}]),
  484:             ct:fail(bad_min_or_max)
  485:         end.
  486: 
  487: min_max_op(Op, {A,B}, {C,D}) ->
  488:     min_max_op_1(Op, A, B, C, D, {infinity,-(1 bsl 24)}).
  489: 
  490: min_max_op_1(Op, A, B, C, D, MinMax0) when A =< B ->
  491:     MinMax = min_max_op_2(Op, A, C, D, MinMax0),
  492:     min_max_op_1(Op, A + 1, B, C, D, MinMax);
  493: min_max_op_1(_Op, _, _, _, _, MinMax) ->
  494:     MinMax.
  495: 
  496: min_max_op_2(Op, A, 0, D, MinMax) when Op =:= 'div'; Op =:= 'rem' ->
  497:     min_max_op_2(Op, A, 1, D, MinMax);
  498: min_max_op_2(Op, A, C, D, MinMax) when C =< D ->
  499:     Val = erlang:Op(A, C),
  500:     case MinMax of
  501:         {Min,Max} when Min =< Val, Val =< Max ->
  502:             min_max_op_2(Op, A, C + 1, D, {Min,Max});
  503:         {Min,Max} ->
  504:             min_max_op_2(Op, A, C + 1, D, {min(Min, Val),max(Max, Val)})
  505:     end;
  506: min_max_op_2(_Op, _, _, _, MinMax) ->
  507:     MinMax.
  508: 
  509: min_max_unary_op(Op, {A,B}) ->
  510:     min_max_unary_op_1(Op, A, B, {infinity,-(1 bsl 24)}).
  511: 
  512: min_max_unary_op_1(Op, A, B, {Min,Max}) when A =< B ->
  513:     Val = erlang:Op(A),
  514:     if
  515:         Min =< Val, Val =< Max ->
  516:             min_max_unary_op_1(Op, A + 1, B, {Min,Max});
  517:         true ->
  518:             min_max_unary_op_1(Op, A + 1, B, {min(Min, Val),max(Max, Val)})
  519:     end;
  520: min_max_unary_op_1(_Op, _, _, MinMax) ->
  521:     MinMax.
  522: 
  523: test_relop(Op) ->
  524:     Max = 15,
  525:     Seq = lists:seq(0, Max),
  526:     _ = [test_relop_1(Op, {A,B}, {C,D}) ||
  527:             A <- Seq,
  528:             B <- lists:nthtail(A, Seq),
  529:             C <- Seq,
  530:             D <- lists:nthtail(C, Seq)],
  531:     ok.
  532: 
  533: test_relop_1(Op, R1, R2) ->
  534:     Bool = rel_op(Op, R1, R2),
  535:     case beam_bounds:relop(Op, R1, R2) of
  536:         Bool ->
  537:             test_infer_relop(Bool, Op, R1, R2);
  538:         Wrong ->
  539:             io:format("~p(~p, ~p) evaluates to ~p; should be ~p\n",
  540:                       [Op,R1,R2,Wrong,Bool]),
  541:             ct:fail(bad_bool_result)
  542:     end.
  543: 
  544: test_infer_relop(true, Op, R1, R2) ->
  545:     any = beam_bounds:infer_relop_types(Op, R1, R2);
  546: test_infer_relop(false, Op, R1, R2) ->
  547:     none = beam_bounds:infer_relop_types(Op, R1, R2);
  548: test_infer_relop('maybe', Op, {A0,B0}=R1, {C0,D0}=R2) ->
  549:     {{A,B},{C,D}} = beam_bounds:infer_relop_types(Op, R1, R2),
  550:     if
  551:         A =< B, C =< D, A0 =< A, B0 >= B, C0 =< C, D0 >= D ->
  552:             ok;
  553:         true ->
  554:             io:format("~p ~p infers as ~p ~p\n",
  555:                       [R1,R2,{A,B},{C,D}]),
  556:             ct:fail(ranges_grew)
  557:     end,
  558:     _ = [begin
  559:              case in_range(X, {A,B}) andalso in_range(Y, {C,D}) of
  560:                  true ->
  561:                      ok;
  562:                  false ->
  563:                      io:format("X = ~p; Y = ~p\n", [X,Y]),
  564:                      io:format("~p ~p infers as ~p ~p\n",
  565:                                [R1,R2,{A,B},{C,D}]),
  566:                      ct:fail(bad_inference)
  567:              end
  568:          end || X <- lists:seq(A0, B0),
  569:                 Y <- lists:seq(C0, D0),
  570:                 erlang:Op(X, Y)],
  571:     ok.
  572: 
  573: in_range(Int, {A,B}) ->
  574:     A =< Int andalso Int =< B.
  575: 
  576: rel_op(Op, {A,B}, {C,D}) ->
  577:     rel_op_1(Op, A, B, C, D, none).
  578: 
  579: rel_op_1(Op, A, B, C, D, BoolResult0) when A =< B ->
  580:     BoolResult = rel_op_2(Op, A, C, D, BoolResult0),
  581:     rel_op_1(Op, A + 1, B, C, D, BoolResult);
  582: rel_op_1(_Op, _, _, _, _, BoolResult) ->
  583:     BoolResult.
  584: 
  585: rel_op_2(Op, A, C, D, BoolResult0) when C =< D ->
  586:     Val = erlang:Op(A, C),
  587:     BoolResult = case BoolResult0 of
  588:                      none -> Val;
  589:                      Val -> BoolResult0;
  590:                      _ -> 'maybe'
  591:                  end,
  592:     rel_op_2(Op, A, C + 1, D, BoolResult);
  593: rel_op_2(_Op, _, _, _, BoolResult) ->
  594:     BoolResult.
  595: 
  596: redundant_masking(_Config) ->
  597:     Min = -7,
  598:     Max = 15,
  599:     Seq = lists:seq(Min, Max),
  600:     _ = [test_redundant_masking({A,B}, M) ||
  601:             A <- Seq,
  602:             B <- lists:nthtail(A-Min, Seq),
  603:             M <- Seq],
  604: 
  605:     false = beam_bounds:is_masking_redundant({'-inf',10}, 16#ff),
  606:     false = beam_bounds:is_masking_redundant({0,'+inf'}, 16#ff),
  607:     ok.
  608: 
  609: test_redundant_masking({A,B}=R, M) ->
  610:     ShouldBe = test_redundant_masking(A, B, M),
  611:     case beam_bounds:is_masking_redundant(R, M) of
  612:         ShouldBe ->
  613:             ok;
  614:         false when M band (M + 1) =/= 0 ->
  615:             %% M + 1 is not a power of two.
  616:             ok;
  617:         false when A =:= B ->
  618:             ok;
  619:         Unexpected ->
  620:             io:format("beam_bounds:is_masking_redundant(~p, ~p) "
  621:                       "evaluates to ~p; should be ~p\n",
  622:                       [R,M,Unexpected,ShouldBe]),
  623:             ct:fail(bad_boolean)
  624:     end.
  625: 
  626: test_redundant_masking(A, B, M) when A =< B ->
  627:     A band M =:= A andalso test_redundant_masking(A + 1, B, M);
  628: test_redundant_masking(_, _, _) -> true.
  629: 
  630: %%%
  631: %%% Common utilities.
  632: %%%
  633: 
  634: id(I) ->
  635:     I.
